      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty​(String val)
        Determines if a string is empty. Empty is defined as null or empty string. 

          OAuth2Utils.isEmpty(null)               = true
  OAuth2Utils.isEmpty("")       = true
  OAuth2Utils.isEmpty(" ")      = false
  OAuth2Utils.isEmpty("bob")    = false
  OAuth2Utils.isEmpty(" bob ")  = false
        Parameters:
        val - string to evaluate as empty.
        Returns:
        true if the string is empty else false.

      • isBlank

        public boolean isBlank​(String val)
              OAuth2Utils.isBlank(null)                = true
      OAuth2Utils.isBlank("")        = true
      OAuth2Utils.isBlank(" ")       = true
      OAuth2Utils.isBlank("bob")     = false
      OAuth2Utils.isBlank("  bob  ") = false

      • getRealm

        public String getRealm​(org.restlet.Request request)
        Get the realm from the Attributes first and then look for the realm in the request.

        Example: Restlet Template populates the realm into the Message.attributes TemplateRoute route = router.attach("/oauth2/ realm/authorize", (Restlet)authorization);}

        Example: Custom code fetches it from the query, the body or more secure from the User Session

        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:

      • getRequestParameters

        public Map<String,​Object> getRequestParameters​(org.restlet.Request request)
        It copies the given parameters only once!!! way the CallResolver can use it and the FreeMarker can list and add all into the generated form
        Parameters:
        request - incoming request object
        Returns:
        The modifiable attributes map.

      • getParameters

        public Map<String,​String> getParameters​(org.restlet.Request request)
        Get the parameters from the request.

        If the method is GET then the parameters are fetched from the query If the request has no body/payload then the parameters are fetched from the query If the content type is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" then the parameters are fetched from the body

        Parameters:
        request - incoming request object
        Returns:
        null if the request does not contains any parameter

      • getConfirmationKey

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getConfirmationKey​(OAuth2Request request)
        Given an OAuth2 request, attempts to pull out the confirmation key; this is optional.
        Parameters:
        request - OAuth2 request
        Returns:
        confirmation key represented as JSON, or null if not present
